tika-abh08t45:2_1: matthakappattiyā saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ sikhāpattā vipassanā. Sikhāpatti panassā udayabbayañāṇādīnaṁ
tika-abh08t45:2_2: aṭṭhañāṇānaṁ vasenāti āha ‘‘aṭṭhañāṇavasenā’’ti. Navamanti saccānulomikañāṇaṁ. Iti
tika-abh08t45:2_3: udayabbayādīni aṭṭha, idañca navamañāṇaṁ paṭipadāñāṇadassananti pavuccati. Paṭipajjati
tika-abh08t45:2_4: etāya ariyamaggoti paṭipadā, udayabbayādīnaṁ jānanaṭṭhena, paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t45:3_0: 1299. Tāni pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṁ ‘‘aṭṭha ñāṇānī’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha udayabbayānupassanāñāṇaṁ
tika-abh08t45:3_1: kiñcāpi tīraṇapariññāya patiṭṭhaṁ, tathāpi yathāvuttaṭṭhena paṭipadāñāṇadassanampi
tika-abh08t45:3_2: hotiyevāti tampi idha vuttaṁ. Itarattha pana uppannamattaṁ appaguṇaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:3_3: Appaguṇañhi niccasaññādipahānasiddhiyā pahānapariññāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṁ. Yato tadadhigamena
tika-abh08t45:3_4: aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā adhigatāva honti. Na hi udayabbayānaṁ paccakkhato
tika-abh08t45:3_5: paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṁ tīraṇamattena sātisayaṁ paṭipakkhappahānaṁ sambhavati.
tika-abh08t45:3_6: Asati ca paṭipakkhappahāne kuto ñāṇādīnaṁ vajiramiva avihatavegatā tikhiṇavisadāditā
tika-abh08t45:3_7: vā, tasmā paguṇabhāvappattaṁ udayabbayañāṇaṁ pahānapariññāpakkhiyameva daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:4_0: 1300-2.Bhaṅgeti saṅkhārānaṁ bhaṅge. Yathābhūtadassāvī bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṁ, tebhūmakadhammā,
tika-abh08t45:4_1: tesu bhayato upatiṭṭhantesu bhāyitabbākāraggāhiñāṇaṁ bhayeñāṇaṁ. Tathā hetaṁ ‘‘bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇa’’nti
tika-abh08t45:4_2: vuccati. Muccituṁ icchatīti muccitukamyaṁ, cittaṁ, puggalo vā, tassa bhāvo muccitukamyatā,
tika-abh08t45:4_3: taṁ pana ñāṇamevāti āha ‘‘ñāṇaṁ muccitukamyatā’’ti. Puna paṭisaṅkhānākārena pavattaṁ
tika-abh08t45:4_4: ñāṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṁ. Nirapekkhatāya saṅkhārānaṁ upekkhanavasena pavattaṁ
tika-abh08t45:4_5: ñāṇaṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ. Gāthābandhatthaṁ pana visandhiniddeso. Oḷārikoḷārikassa
tika-abh08t45:4_6: saccapaṭicchādakatamassa vigamanena saccapaṭivedhānukūlattā saccānulomikaṁ. Taṁ pana
tika-abh08t45:5_0: 1303. Nanu ca udayabbayañāṇassa pageva siddhattā kimatthaṁ puna tatthāpi abhiyogoti
tika-abh08t45:5_1: ce? Aniccādilakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthaṁ. Udayabbayañāṇañhi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi
tika-abh08t45:5_2: upakkiliṭṭhaṁ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṁ sallakkhetuṁ nāsakkhi, upakkilesavinimuttaṁ
tika-abh08t45:5_3: pana sakkoti, tasmā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthaṁ puna tattheva yogo kātabbo. Lakkhaṇāni
tika-abh08t45:5_4: cassa udayabbayādīnaṁ amanasikārā, santatiiriyāpathaghanachannatāya ca nopaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t45:5_5: tasmā udayabbayaṁ manasi katvā santatiṁ ugghāṭetvā aniccalakkhaṇaṁ, abhiṇhapīḷanaṁ
tika-abh08t45:5_6: pariggahetvā iriyāpathaṁ ugghāṭetvā dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ, dhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhogaṁ
tika-abh08t45:5_7: katvā anattalakkhaṇañca sallakkhetvā ‘‘aniccā dukkhā anattā’’ti saṅkhārā punappunaṁ
tika-abh08t45:5_8: sammasitabbā. Tassevaṁ tulayato tīrayato yadā saṅkhāragataṁ attano lahuupaṭṭhānena,
tika-abh08t45:5_9: ñāṇassa ca tikkhatāya tirohituppādādibhedaṁ bhijjamānameva upaṭṭhāti, bhaṅgeyeva
tika-abh08t45:5_10: tassa ñāṇaṁ santiṭṭhati, tadā bhaṅgānupassanā nāma vipassanāñāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t45:5_11: Tassa tadeva saṅkhāranirodhārammaṇabhaṅgānupassanaṁ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsesu
tika-abh08t45:5_12: saṅkhārā bhijjanasabhāvatāya yakkharakkhasādayo viya mahābhayaṁ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t45:5_13: tadāssa bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ adhigataṁ hoti. Kiṁ panidaṁ ñāṇaṁ bhāyatīti? Na bhāyati.
tika-abh08t45:5_14: Tañhi ‘‘atītā saṅkhārā niruddhā, paccuppannā nirujjhanti, anāgatā nirujjhissantī’’ti
tika-abh08t45:5_15: tīraṇamattameva hoti, byasanāpannānaṁ pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṁ bhayato upaṭṭhitānaṁ
tika-abh08t45:6_0: Tassa taṁ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṁ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavagatesu saṅkhāresu tāṇaṁ
tika-abh08t45:6_1: vā leṇaṁ vā parāyaṇaṁ vā na paññāyati, ukkhittāsiko viya paccāmitto sādīnavā eva
tika-abh08t45:6_2: saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti, tassa saṅkhārānaṁ ādīnavameva passantassa ādīnavañāṇaṁ nāma
tika-abh08t45:6_3: uppannaṁ hoti. Tassevaṁ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passantassa yadā tibhavapariyāpannesu
tika-abh08t45:6_4: nibbedo uppajjati, ukkaṇṭhā saṇṭhahanti, sabbasaṅkhāravisaṁyutte santipade abhiratiṁ
tika-abh08t45:6_5: paṭilabhati, tadāssa nibbidānupassanaṁ nāma ñāṇaṁ uppannaṁ hoti. Tassa yadā iminā
tika-abh08t45:6_6: nibbidāñāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindantassa ekasaṅkhārepi cittaṁ na sajjati, sabbasmā
tika-abh08t45:6_7: saṅkhārato sappamukhagatassa viya maṇḍūkassa muccitukāmatā uppajjati, tadā muccitukamyatāñāṇaṁ
tika-abh08t45:6_8: nāma uppannaṁ hoti. Tassevaṁ sabbasaṅkhārehi muccitukāmassa niccasukhasubhaattākārena
tika-abh08t45:6_9: pana upaṭṭhituṁ asamatthataṁ pāpetvā muccanassa upāyasampādanatthaṁ aniccantikatādīhi
tika-abh08t45:6_11: tucchatādīhi anattalakkhaṇañca āropetvā sabbasaṅkhāragataṁ pariggaṇhantassa paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṁ
tika-abh08t45:6_12: nāma uppannaṁ hoti. Tena panevaṁ pariggahitasaṅkhārena yā sā ‘‘suññamidaṁ attena
tika-abh08t45:6_13: vā attaniyena vā’’tiādinā dvikoṭikādibhedā suññatā vuttā, sā pariggahetabbā. Tassevaṁ
tika-abh08t45:6_14: suññato disvā tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā sammasantassa yadā bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya
tika-abh08t45:6_15: vissaṭṭhabhariyassa viya saṅkhāragatesu upekkhā santiṭṭhati, tīsu bhavesu cittaṁ
tika-abh08t45:6_16: na sampasāriyati, tadāssa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ nāma uppannaṁ hoti. Taṁ panetaṁ yāva
tika-abh08t45:6_17: nibbānaṁ na passati, tāva disākāko viya kūpakayaṭṭhiṁ punappunaṁ saṅkhārameva anabhimatampi
tika-abh08t45:6_18: nissāya saṅkhāravicinanepi majjhattameva hutvā tiṭṭhati. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘etesu pana ñāṇesū’’tiādi.
tika-abh08t45:7_0: 1306.Vipassanā…pe… vuṭṭhānagāminīti sikhaṁ uttamabhāvaṁ pattattā sikhāpattā. Vuṭṭhānaṁ
tika-abh08t45:7_1: gacchatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī. ‘‘Vuṭṭhāna’’nti hi bahiddhā nimittabhūtā abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto
tika-abh08t45:7_2: ceva ajjhattappavattato ca vuṭṭhahanato maggo vuccati, taṁ gacchatīti vuṭṭhānagāminī,
tika-abh08t45:8_0: 1307.Tanti yaṁ sikhāpattā vipassanā saccānulomañāṇanti ca vuccati, taṁ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṁ.
tika-abh08t45:8_1: Āsevantassāti punappunaṁ sammasanavasena sevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa.
tika-abh08t45:8_2: Tassa hi adhimokkhasaddhā bhāvanāvasena balavatarā nibbattissati, vīriyaṁ supaggahitaṁ
tika-abh08t45:8_3: paṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthaṁ hoti, ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena sati supatiṭṭhitā hoti,
tika-abh08t45:8_4: passaddhisukhānaṁ sātisayatāya cittaṁ susamāhitaṁ, tatova anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo
tika-abh08t45:9_0: 1308-12.Aniccā…pe… votarateva sāti aniccādīsu ekena ākārena sammasantī sattakkhattuṁ
tika-abh08t45:9_1: pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṁ otiṇṇā nāma hoti, tato paraṁ bhavaṅgavāroti katvā
tika-abh08t45:9_3: na sammasitanayena. Tenāha ‘‘aniccādi…pe… kurumāna’’nti. Bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṁ katvāti
tika-abh08t45:9_4: bhavaṅgassa nivattanaṁ katvā cittassa bhavaṅgavasena pavattituṁ adatvā. Parikammanti
tika-abh08t45:9_5: maggassa parikammattā paṭisaṅkhārakattā. Upacāranti maggassa āsannattā, samīpacārittā vā.
tika-abh08t45:10_1: saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattattā, ‘‘udayabbayavantānaṁyeva vata dhammānaṁ udayabbayañāṇaṁ
tika-abh08t45:10_2: uppādavaye addasā’’ti ca ‘‘bhaṅgavantānaṁyeva vata bhaṅgānupassanaṁ bhaṅgamaddasā’’ti
tika-abh08t45:10_3: ca ‘‘sabhayaṁyeva vata bhayatupaṭṭhānassa bhayato upaṭṭhita’’nti ca ‘‘sādīnaveyeva
tika-abh08t45:10_4: vata ādīnavānupassanaṁ ādīnavamaddasā’’ti ca ‘‘nibbinditabbeyeva vata nibbidāñāṇaṁ
tika-abh08t45:10_5: nibbinda’’nti ca ‘‘muccitabbamhiyeva vata muccitukamyatāñāṇaṁ muccitukāmaṁ jāta’’nti
tika-abh08t45:10_7: vata saṅkhārupekkhāya upekkhita’’nti ca atthato vadamānaṁ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṁ
tika-abh08t45:10_8: ñāṇānaṁ katakiccatāya anulometi sabbāsaṁyeva vipassanānaṁ lakkhaṇattayasammasanakiccattā,
tika-abh08t45:10_9: tathā upari ca ariyamagge sattatiṁsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ tāya paṭipadāya pattabbatāya.
tika-abh08t45:10_11: gotrabhuñāṇaṁ uppajjati, gotrabhuñāṇe ca anuppanne maggañāṇaṁ na uppajjati, tasmā
tika-abh08t45:10_12: purimapacchimānaṁ bhāgānaṁ anulomattā ‘‘anulomanti saññita’’nti. Tenevāti heṭṭhimañāṇānaṁ
tika-abh08t45:10_13: anulomamukhena, upari bodhipakkhiyānaṁ anulomanato ca. Saccānulomañāṇanti pavuccati
tika-abh08t45:10_15: vipassanāya. Pariyosānanti purimā koṭi. Saṅkhārārammaṇavipassanāsu hi ayaṁ visesato
tika-abh08t45:10_16: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāti. Asaṅkhatārammaṇaṁ pana sabbena sabbaṁ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṁ
tika-abh08t45:10_17: vuṭṭhānaṁ gacchati upetīti. Tatopi hi visesato ‘‘vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā’’ti vattabbataṁ
tika-abh08t45:11_1: gavesanato mahesinā sammāsambuddhena. Santakilesatāya santā. Yoganti bhāvanaṁ, bhāvanābhiyogaṁ vā.
